title: AccuTec Pro: Cookie Jar
description: Reinforced perceived value through a collectible-style format, while aligning with the broader packaging redesign system that optimized ink usage and visual consistency across SKUs.

title: AccuTec Pro: Premium Line
description: Elevated brand perception through refined visual hierarchy and expanded color use — distinguishing the Infinity sub-line while staying within core packaging constraints.

title: AccuTec Pro: Packaging Built From the Ground Up
description: Designed a scalable, two-ink packaging system across 200+ SKUs — reducing production complexity and generating an estimated $300K+ in annual printing savings while improving brand consistency and shelf impact.
imageAlt: AccuTec Pro: Packaging Built From the Ground Up

title: AccuTec Pro: Display Packaging
description: Elevated product presence through a tailored die-cut structure — aligned with the brand’s redesigned packaging system optimized for 2-ink production and streamlined format control.

title: Aguamiel: Cylindrical Container
description: Delivered premium shelf presence on a minimal budget by selecting an affordable container and focusing on high-impact visual storytelling.

title: Casa Leña: Sonoran Flavor Meets Flexible Pouch
description: Minimized production costs by designing a label-only solution for pre-manufactured pouches — enabling artisanal branding with minimal print setup for low-volume regional distribution and Amazon-ready presence.
imageAlt: Casa Leña: Sonoran Flavor Meets Flexible Pouch

title: AccuTec Pro: Retail Display Box
description: Reduced printing costs through a single-ink design, while creating a transport-to-shelf structure adaptable to multiple blister formats across retail and e-commerce.

title: AccuTec Pro: Low-Cost Poly Bags — Blades Packaging
description: Optimized packaging costs by switching to polybag formats — preserving brand clarity while improving distribution and storage efficiency for entry-level SKUs.
imageAlt: AccuTec Pro: Low-Cost Poly Bags — Blades Packaging
